document.full_text: as korea has become more "westernized" since the late-1990s, the number of adults with multiple risk factors for heart disease and diabetes has steadily climbed, a new study finds.
document.title: heart risk factors rising in "westernizing" korea
lines_and_colors: as korea has become more "westernized" since the late-1990s, the number of adults with multiple risk factors for heart disease and diabetes has steadily climbed, a new study finds.
